hero.title: Where Glass Becomes Art
hero.subtitle: Crafting premium packaging that tells your brand's story.

tradition.title: Seven Decades of Excellence
tradition.description: Since 1950, RAPSODI DEKOR has been Turkey's pioneer in glass decoration. We blend time-honored artistry with innovative technology to create packaging that defines luxury for the world's most prestigious brands.

clients.title: The Choice of Iconic Brands Worldwide

elevate.title: Transform Your Vision
elevate.subtitle: Bespoke designs, flawless execution
elevate.description: Let's create packaging that speaks volumes. Our master artisans turn your brand's essence into tangible luxury that resonates with your audience.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Since the 1950s, Rapsodi Dekor has been pioneering glass decoration, continuing to make a difference in the industry with three generations of accumulated knowledge and experience. By blending modern technology with traditional craftsmanship, we produce exclusive solutions for prestigious brands around the world.

activityAreas.title: Our Areas of Activity
activityAreas.content: We strengthen brands' visual identity through silk screen printing, hot foil stamping, precious metal coating, organic painting, and metalized printing techniques applied to glass and plastic packaging. In our 10,000 m² modern facility, our team of 450 expert personnel decorates over 300,000 products daily.

sectoralServices.title: Sectoral Services
sectoralServices.content: We serve a wide range of industries from cosmetics to food and beverage, from glassware to home decoration. By developing specialized solutions for each sector's unique needs, we differentiate our customers' products from their competitors.

qualityApproach.title: Our Quality Approach
qualityApproach.content: In our facility certified with ISO 9001:2015 quality management system, we apply meticulous quality controls at every stage of production. All our processes, from raw material selection to the final product, are carried out in accordance with international standards.

sustainability.title: Our Sustainability Approach
sustainability.content: In line with our environmentally conscious production philosophy, we use water-based organic paints and recyclable materials. With our energy-efficient machinery and waste management systems, we aim to leave a cleaner world for future generations.

exportGlobal.title: Export and Global Service
exportGlobal.paragraph1: In addition to Turkey, we export to more than 40 countries across Europe, Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Our global customer portfolio is the greatest proof of our quality and reliability.
exportGlobal.paragraph2: With our international logistics network and experienced export team, we guarantee timely and secure delivery to any point in the world.

corporateValues.title: Our Corporate Values
corporateValues.content: Prioritizing customer satisfaction, we operate with principles of trust, quality, innovation, and sustainability. By investing in our employees' development, we nurture professionals who shape the future of our industry.

silkScreen.title: Silk Screen Printing
silkScreen.subtitle: Mastering the Art of Silk Screen
silkScreen.glassProduct: RAPSODI DEKOR, started to use the serigraph printing technique, which is the first and the most important line of production, in 1997. Applying organic, thermoplastic, and UV prints on all kinds of glass packaging; our company offers distinctness to its customers. Additionally, we are also able to transfer the shadow copy of a picture on a glass surface with CMYK printing technique.
silkScreen.plasticProduct: Our company's serigraph printing unit is sufficiently qualified to work in all order quantities by means of multi-color and single-color full- and semi-automatic machines as well as manual printing systems.
silkScreen.capabilities: Our printing machines are capable of making single-color and multi-color prints on products that has a height range of 2 cm and 40 cm. Depending on our customers' PANTONE color demands; our company is able to give service in all main and accent print colors.

hotFoil.title: Hot-Foil Stamping
hotFoil.subtitle: Adding Shine with Hot Foil
hotFoil.description: RAPSODİ DEKOR applies hot foil gilding printing on glass surfaces. In addition, with its fully automatic hot foil machine lines, it can print on cam products of all sizes and shapes in high quantity, as well as foil and multi-color printing at the same time.

preciousMetals.title: Precious Metals Application
preciousMetals.subtitle: Ultimate Luxury with Precious Metals
preciousMetals.description: RAPSODI DEKOR applies precious metal printing, which enables the products to look shinier, higher quality and vivid. By firing gold, platinum and copper (rose) varieties in 600-degree furnaces; it offers a wide range of Precious Product variety.

organicPainting.title: Organic Painting
organicPainting.subtitle: Vibrant and Eco-Friendly Painting
organicPainting.description: With automatic conveyor painting lines, RAPSODI DEKOR has a daily capacity of painting 150,000 pieces. Depending on PANTONE color demands, coloring can be made in all main and access colors with environment-friendly water-based paints and painting with different effects (transparent, opaque, matt, metallic, silvery, and soft touch). In addition to glass products; our company can also apply paint on plastic products (PP, PE, Pet).

metalizedPrinting.title: Metalized Printing
metalizedPrinting.subtitle: Stunning Metallic Mirror Effects
metalizedPrinting.description1: RAPSODI DEKOR applies in its painting lines Metalized printings that enable the product to shine and reflect like a mirror, which is also called the mirror effect.
metalizedPrinting.description2: Our high capacity for metalized printing works, which are especially sought for in cosmetics and home decoration sectors today, provide a wide product diversity to our customer companies.

masking.title: Masking
masking.subtitle: Precision Masking Techniques
masking.description: RAPSODI DEKOR; depending on its customers' demands, makes zonal decorations. This is a decorating technique applied by masking the zones that are requested to remain transparent with max affixation method.
